name: H. Banquet Preparations 2
statement:
The chef has cooked n dishes yet again: the i-th dish consists of a_i
grams of fish and b_i grams of meat. Banquet organizers consider two
dishes i and j equal if a_i=a_j and b_i=b_j at the same time.The banquet
organizers estimate the of n dishes as follows. The of a set of dishes
is equal to the number of different dishes in it. The is, the .In order
to reduce the , a taster was invited. He will eat m_i grams of food from
each dish. For each dish, the taster determines separately how much fish
and how much meat he will eat. The only condition is that he will eat
exactly m_i grams of the i-th dish in total.Determine how much of what
type of food the taster should eat from each dish so that the value of
is the minimum possible. If there are several correct answers, you may
output any of them.
